entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:32 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
